title: Google Calendar icon
content:
Hello, I use Google calendar on my W10 computer and want to also use it on my Pixel 3a so I downloaded the Google calendar app to my Pixel 3a.
I have roughly 25 different icons on my Pixel 3a "home page" but NOT the Google calendar icon.
I CAN open Google calendar but ONLY if I go to the Google Play Store, locate the Google calendar app and click OPEN so my question is, how do I create a Google calendar icon on my Pixel 3a "home screen"?
Thank you
Bob
